Title: Just built my first microservice API, and it's hacky.  Any examples to follow?
EnhancedContent: I just finished building my first microservices-based API, and it's ugly.Â  Are there any online source examples that include two (or more) API microservices communicating with each other over a message bus, that also include authentication using both a local authentication database and/or OpenID Connect?
Author: johnson_earls
Description: I just finished building my first microservices-based API, and it's ugly. Are there any online source examples that include two (or more) API microservices communicating with each other over a message bus, that also include authentication using both a local authentication database and/or OpenID Connect?
